subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|むすめ}}
Compound of {{com|ja|sort=むすめ|生す|tr1=musu|t1=to beget|女|tr2=me|t2=female}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR"></ref>

subSections.title: Noun
Synonyms
